name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Express**, **AWS**, and **CI/CD**. Proven expertise in building responsive user interfaces and scalable backend systems while ensuring best practices in compliance, performance, and security. Proficient in managing state with **Redux** and applying **Hooks** for efficient rendering, alongside strong skills in building REST and GraphQL APIs.

Accomplished in databases such as **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, with a keen focus on optimizing application accessibility and usability through testing tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**. Demonstrated ability to lead code reviews and foster a detail-oriented, creative, and problem-solving work environment. Experienced in utilizing cloud services, deploying solutions on **AWS EC2**, **AWS Lambda**, and **AWS S3**.

Skilled in enhancing user experiences through well-architected systems aligned with performance metrics and security standards, drawing from a rich background in compliance-driven development within the healthcare and financial sectors.

• Utilized **Redux** and **Hooks** for state management in complex interactive applications, enhancing user experience through efficient data flow.
• Created RESTful and **GraphQL** APIs for seamless communication between frontend and backend systems, enabling robust data handling solutions.
• Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines incorporating **Firebase** for real-time monitoring, **AWS** services including **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **S3** for scalable serving of applications.
• Managed and optimized databases including **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring reliable data storage and retrieval for intricate application requirements.
• Conducted thorough code reviews emphasizing performance and security, implementing best practices in application development.
• Ensured accessibility across applications using tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, promoting usability for diverse user groups.
• Engaged in problem-solving through detailed debug processes, consistently maintaining high accuracy and reliability in delivery outcomes.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate creative and innovative solutions into projects, aligning with business goals and user needs.
• Focused on data integrity and system performance, achieving high operational KPIs through meticulous attention to detail.

Utilized **React (18)** and **TypeScript** combined with **Redux** for state management to build interactive front-end applications, enhancing user experience for financial tools and admin panels.
Implemented best practices in **Node.js** (Express) to modernize core financial platforms through a microservices architecture, improving scalability and performance to support up to **10,000** transactions per minute.
Developed REST and GraphQL APIs for robust communication between front-end and back-end services, ensuring efficient data retrieval and updates in applications.
Engineered databases using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** to manage and analyze large volumes of financial data, resulting in reduced query response time by **30%**.
Deployed CI/CD pipelines for streamlined development and deployment processes, reducing release cycle time by **40%**.
Conducted comprehensive code reviews focused on security, performance, and accessibility, maintaining high-quality code standards and leveraging tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**.
Designed and implemented innovative features with a strong emphasis on creativity and detail-oriented development, proactively solving problems to improve application functionality.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure best practices in system architecture and performance optimization, leveraging cloud services like **AWS** (EC2, Lambda, S3) for scalable infrastructure.

• Developed and optimized e-commerce frontend applications using **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, **Redux**, and **CSS**, ensuring adherence to performance and accessibility best practices.
• Built responsive UIs compliant with WCAG 2.1 employing **HTML5** and **CSS3**, achieving a user-friendly design across devices with a focus on creativity and detail-oriented implementation.
• Engineered robust backend services utilizing **Node.js (Express)**, ensuring RESTful API functionality and dynamic data handling through **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for efficient data access and storage.
• Implemented CI/CD workflows leveraging **AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3)** for streamlined deployment processes, increasing deployment frequency by over **50%**.
• Conducted thorough **code reviews** to maintain high-quality code standards, enhancing team collaboration and skill development, with a focus on security and performance.

• Utilized **Firebase** for real-time data syncing, which reduced load times by up to **30%** while enhancing site performance metrics analyzed via **Lighthouse**.
• Engaged in continuous improvement initiatives by assessing the application with **Axe** for accessibility checks, ensuring compliance and usability for all users.
• Integrated automated testing strategies to validate application functionality and security, reinforcing best practices in development lifecycle.
